statements: SELECT * FROM forensic_analysis;
SELECT case_id, suspect_name FROM forensic_analysis WHERE incident_date = '2022-04-15';
SELECT suspect_name, incident_details FROM forensic_analysis WHERE case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM forensic_analysis ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM forensic_analysis WHERE suspect_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY case_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM forensic_analysis WHERE suspect_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT case_id, suspect_name FROM forensic_analysis WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT case_id, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM forensic_analysis GROUP BY case_id HAVING total_cases > 1
SELECT DISTINCT suspect_name FROM forensic_analysis WHERE incident_details LIKE '%fraud%'
SELECT case_id, incident_date FROM forensic_analysis WHERE suspect_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM evidence ORDER BY evidence_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE severity BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents si JOIN evidence e ON si.incident_id = e.incident_id WHERE si.severity < 3 AND e.evidence_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%attack%' ORDER BY severity DESC, incident_date ASC;
SELECT si.incident_id, e.evidence_info FROM security_incidents si LEFT JOIN evidence e ON si.incident_id = e.incident_id WHERE e.evidence_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY e.evidence_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT report_name, incident_date FROM incident_reports WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, description FROM evidence ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspects WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT report_name, description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT report_name, incident_date FROM incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, description FROM incident_reports WHERE id = 3;
SELECT e.evidence_type, e.description, ir.report_name FROM evidence e JOIN incident_reports ir ON e.report_id = ir.id;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT report_id, incident_date, description FROM IncidentReports;
SELECT * FROM Investigators WHERE specialization = 'Forensics';
SELECT * FROM Evidence ORDER BY evidence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suspects WHERE status = 'Wanted' AND name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE investigator_id = 1 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM Investigators WHERE specialization = 'Forensic Science';
SELECT suspect_id, name, status FROM Suspects WHERE status = 'Wanted' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT e.*, r.description FROM Evidence e JOIN IncidentReports r ON e.report_id = r.report_id WHERE e.type = 'Document';
SELECT i.name, COUNT(e.evidence_id) AS evidence_count FROM Investigators i LEFT JOIN Evidence e ON i.investigator_id = e.report_id GROUP BY i.name ORDER BY evidence_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Incident;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM Incident;
SELECT * FROM Evidence WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT investigator_name FROM Investigator ORDER BY investigator_name DESC;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM Incident WHERE incident_type = 'Theft';
SELECT * FROM Incident WHERE incident_type = 'Theft';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM Incident WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Investigator.investigator_name, Investigation.investigation_start_date, Incident.incident_type FROM Investigation JOIN Investigator ON Investigation.investigator_id = Investigator.investigator_id JOIN Incident ON Investigation.incident_id = Incident.incident_id WHERE Incident.incident_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY Investigation.investigation_start_date DESC;

SELECT Incident.incident_id, Investigator.investigator_name FROM Report JOIN Incident ON Report.incident_id = Incident.incident_id JOIN Investigator ON Report.investigator_id = Investigator.investigator_id WHERE Report.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY Report.report_date ASC;

SELECT Incident.incident_type, COUNT(*) AS num_investigations FROM Investigation JOIN Incident ON Investigation.incident_id = Incident.incident_id GROUP BY Incident.incident_type HAVING num_investigations > 1 ORDER BY num_investigations DESC;
